STEFAN SMAGULA
Software product manager

To Augment Human Intelligence

My goal is to help create software that extends the reach of not just our hands but our minds, as well.

Traders, bankers, chainsaw salesmen

From a $100 M project to help invent Bloomberg NEXT, used by traders and central bankers around the world, to powering all of Google's local ads, I've helped to create iconic apps used by millions.

Learn more

Product management and design

At Google I helped make Docs and Drive clearer, more understandable, and more collaborative. Recently, I prototyped an iOS app for electric car drivers to reserve clean energy.

See Examples

Extending our abilities

Douglas Englebart and Vannevar Bush demonstrated that software can augment the human mind and contribute to the common good. It's this spirit of invention that inspires me.

Making software stronger

Whether conducting research on the trading floors of PIMCO in London, prioritizing epics for managing risk at logistics companies, or prototyping a mobile app that offers a cure for electric-car range anxiety, my goal is to help create robust, resilient, powerful software.

Making Clean Hydrogen

Each HydrogeNXT station creates clean hydrogen using biogas and natural gas

  • Biogas

    From agricultural waste

    Pigs, cows, and landfills produce methane gas. Biogas suppliers capture that methane and prevent it from entering the atmosphere, where it would contribute to the greenhouse effect.

  • Pipeline

    Biogas delivered to pipeline

    Farmers and landfill operators clean up the captured biogas and then deliver it to the same common carrier pipeline system that supplies homes with natural gas for heating and cooking. At this point, it's truly natural gas.

  • Hydrogen

    Methane is converted to hydrogen

    Each HydrogeNXT station has two steam methane reformers which use pressure and steam to convert the methane in natural gas into hydrogen.

  • Peace

    No range anxiety for drivers. Resilient power for business

    Using our patented mobile reservation system drivers can reserve hydrogen at any station in our network and rest assured. View mobile reservation app video

  • Let's Get
    There
    Faster
